assessments.status_rationale: No BLS nonfarm payrolls data for October 2025 is cited; release is due in early November and the deadline has not passed.
No ISM Services Prices Index reading for October 2025 appears in the news; the report is scheduled for early November.
No Department of Labor continuing claims figure indicating ≥1.90 million is reported; multiple weekly releases remain before the deadline.
No euro area October 2025 HICP flash estimate is mentioned; Eurostat release is expected at month-end.
No China October 2025 Customs trade data is referenced; release typically comes in early November.
No NAR September 2025 existing home sales figure is in the coverage; the release is expected imminently and the deadline is tomorrow.
No evidence that DXY has closed at or below 103.00; the window remains open through November 30.
No report of ICE Brent settling at or below $80.00; the condition could still occur before the deadline.
No EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage figure reaching ≥3.90 Tcf is cited; additional weekly reports precede the deadline.
No October 2025 Retail Sales Control Group data is mentioned; Census release is mid-November.
No confirmation that the 10Y TIPS breakeven closed ≥2.50%; the threshold could still be met by November 30.
Microsoft has not reported Q1 FY2026 results yet; AWS outage news does not provide Azure growth figures.
Apple’s fiscal Q4 2025 earnings (including Services growth) have not been released; stock move on iPhone sales does not resolve this.
